entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers at times heavy beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
